messages.text: That’s enough water to flush a toilet * times!
That’s enough water to make * cups of coffee!
That’s enough water to brush your teeth * times!
That’s enough water to make * ice cubes!
That’s enough water to fill * balloons!
That’s enough water to water * houseplants!
That’s enough water to boil * eggs!
That’s enough water to brew * pots of tea!
